original_text: It is for the prince; the prince, he shall sit in it to eat bread before the Lord; he shall enter by the way of the porch of that gate, and shall go out by the way of the same.
korean_text: 왕은 왕인 까닭에 안 길로 이 문 현관으로 들어와서 거기에 앉아서 나 여호와 앞에서 음식을 먹고 그 길로 나갈 것이니라

sentences.original_text: the prince, he shall sit in it
to eat bread before the Lord
he shall enter by the way of the porch of that gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 문의 현관 길로 들어갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: and shall go out by the way of the same
